languages.text: Почти вся поверхность мира покрыта слоем льда, под которым бушуют изумрудные воды океанов. Согласно данным телеметрии, температура на планете понижается на несколько градусов каждый десяток лет, и совсем скоро местные воды навсегда превратятся в изумрудные ледники.

traits.locale_text: Почти вся поверхность мира покрыта слоем льда, под которым бушуют изумрудные воды океанов. Согласно данным телеметрии, температура на планете понижается на несколько градусов каждый десяток лет, и совсем скоро местные воды навсегда превратятся в изумрудные ледники.

languages.text: Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.
languages.original_text: Почти вся поверхность мира покрыта слоем льда, под которым бушуют изумрудные воды океанов. Согласно данным телеметрии, температура на планете понижается на несколько градусов каждый десяток лет, и совсем скоро местные воды навсегда превратятся в изумрудные ледники.

traits.locale_text: Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet is dropping by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into smaragdine glaciers sooner rather than later.

Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet is dropping by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into smaragdine glaciers sooner rather than later.

Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

languages.text: 几乎整颗行星表面都被冰层覆盖，下面隐藏着翡翠色的海水。探测数据显示，这颗行星的温度每隔十年就会下降几度。因此，当地的海水迟早会冻成翠绿的冰川。
languages.original_text: Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

traits.locale_text: 几乎整颗行星表面都被冰层覆盖，下面隐藏着翡翠色的海水。探测数据显示，这颗行星的温度每隔十年就会下降几度。因此，当地的海水迟早会冻成翠绿的冰川。

languages.text: 惑星のほぼ全域が氷の層に覆われ、エメラルド色の海を隠している。遠隔測定データによると、惑星の気温は10年ごとに数度低下しており、現地の水は遅かれ早かれエメラルド色の氷河に変わるだろう。
languages.original_text: Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

traits.locale_text: 惑星のほぼ全域が氷の層に覆われ、エメラルド色の海を隠している。遠隔測定データによると、惑星の気温は10年ごとに数度低下しており、現地の水は遅かれ早かれエメラルド色の氷河に変わるだろう。

languages.text: Casi toda la superficie del mundo está cubierta por una capa de hielo que oculta las aguas esmeralda del océano. Según los datos de telemetría, la temperatura del planeta desciende unos grados cada década, y las aguas locales se convertirán en glaciares esmeralda más pronto que tarde.
languages.original_text: Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

traits.locale_text: Casi toda la superficie del mundo está cubierta por una capa de hielo que oculta las aguas esmeralda del océano. Según los datos de telemetría, la temperatura del planeta desciende unos grados cada década, y las aguas locales se convertirán en glaciares esmeralda más pronto que tarde.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Fast die gesamte Oberfläche der Welt ist mit einer Eisschicht bedeckt, welche die smaragdgrünen Wasser des Ozeans verbirgt. Laut Telemetriedaten sinkt die Temperatur auf dem Planeten alle zehn Jahre um ein paar Grad, und das örtliche Wasser wird sich eher früher als später in smaragdfarbene Gletscher verwandeln.
languages.original_text: Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

traits.locale_text: Fast die gesamte Oberfläche der Welt ist mit einer Eisschicht bedeckt, welche die smaragdgrünen Wasser des Ozeans verbirgt. Laut Telemetriedaten sinkt die Temperatur auf dem Planeten alle zehn Jahre um ein paar Grad, und das örtliche Wasser wird sich eher früher als später in smaragdfarbene Gletscher verwandeln.

languages.text: La quasi-totalité de la surface de ce monde est recouverte d'une couche de glace masquant les eaux émeraude de l'océan. Selon les données télémétriques, la température de la planète chute de quelques degrés tous les dix ans, de sorte que ces mers sont vouées à se transformer progressivement en un immense glacier.
languages.original_text: Almost the entire surface of the world is covered by a layer of ice, hiding the emerald waters of the ocean. According to telemetry data, the temperature on the planet drops by a few degrees every decade, and the local water is bound to turn into emerald glaciers sooner rather than later.

traits.locale_text: La quasi-totalité de la surface de ce monde est recouverte d'une couche de glace masquant les eaux émeraude de l'océan. Selon les données télémétriques, la température de la planète chute de quelques degrés tous les dix ans, de sorte que ces mers sont vouées à se transformer progressivement en un immense glacier.
